episode_summary: This episode covers a variety of intriguing topics, including the naming of a large Russian diamond, the mystery of why shoelaces untie themselves, the near mishap of HMS Victory's launch, and the surprising fact about chocolate hobnobs.

facts.fact: The largest diamond ever found in Russia is called the 26th Congress of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union.
Scientists have announced that they finally know why shoelaces untie themselves.
Nelson's ship HMS Victory nearly didn't get out of the dock it was built in because it was too big.
In a chocolate hobnob, the chocolate is on the bottom.
